pkgmetadata.longdescription: # asariAsari is a Japanese sentiment analyzer implemented in Python.## UsageBehold, the power of asari:```pythonfrom asari.api import Sonarsonar = Sonar()sonar.ping(text="広告多すぎる♡"){ "text" : "広告多すぎる♡", "top_class" : "negative", "classes" : [ { "class_name" : "positive", "confidence" : 0.09130180181262026 }, { "class_name" : "negative", "confidence" : 0.9086981981873797 } ]}```Asari allows you to classify text into positive/negative class, without the need for training. You have only to fed text into asari.## InstallationTo install asari, simply use `pip` with Python 3.8+:```bashpip install asari```
